definitions.definition: The quality , colour , or appearance of the skin on the face .
Outlook , attitude , or point of view .
The combination of humours making up one's physiological " temperament ", being either hot or cold , and moist or dry .

labels: especially in scientific works translated from German
definitions.label_groups: loanword , especially in scientific works translated from German

main_definition: The quality , colour , or appearance of the skin on the face .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) The outward appearance of something.
Outlook , attitude , or point of view .
( obsolete , medicine ) The combination of humours making up one's physiological " temperament ", being either hot or cold , and moist or dry .
( loanword , especially in scientific works translated from German ) An arrangement.
